name: Mazanasada
preparation:
This tequila-and-mezcal drink with apple cider and ginger beer is a delicious tipple for the fall or winter.

Coat the rim of a Collins glass with spice sugar, fill with ice and set aside.

Add the tequila, mezcal cider and lemon juice to a shaker, and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into the prepared glass.

Fill with ginger beer and garnish with diced red apple.
